sense.name: Fail utterly, break down, sink, or collapse (also metaphorically).
sense.examples: Free State Glass Industries foundered under its original management. The sporty coupe foundered in part because American buyers didn't go for the car's unusual double-wing rear spoiler. The business foundered and sank. A war ship foundered yesterday off the coast of Panama.

sense.name: Stumble and nearly fall (must be literal).
sense.examples: The horses foundered out of the gate. The child foundered as it struggled to walk.
